attributes.action: Lobby the Indian Government to remove the requirement for female civil servants to supply details of their menstrual cycle and last maternity leave on their annual appraisal forms.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Indian Government has introduced new rules requiring all female civil servants to provide details of their mentrual cycle and last materity leave in their annual appraisal and health check.

This type of information has no bearing on a woman's abilty to perform their job and can only be used against them. 

Requesting and collecting such data is outlawed in the UK since it serves no purpose other than to enable discrimination.
